data.event: In 1042, archon Stefan Vojislav led a revolt that resulted in the independence of Duklja and the establishment of the Vojislavljević dynasty.

event.title: reached its zenith under Vojislav's son, Mihailo (1046

data.event: Duklja reached its zenith under Vojislav's son, Mihailo (1046–81), and his grandson Bodin (1081–1101).
The House of Petrović-Njegoš ruled until 1918.
On the basis of an independence referendum held on 21 May 2006, Montenegro declared independence on 3 June of that year.
On the basis of an independence referendum held on 21 May 2006, Montenegro declared independence on 3 June of that year.
